medical_history.chief_complaint: Insomnia and severe burning sensation and pain in the lumbar spine, hip and knee joints, and soles of the feet.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 5 months prior to admission, with primary symptoms of insomnia and burning pain. Despite initial treatment, symptoms persisted and led to additional issues such as dizziness, nausea, ataxia, blurred vision, hypersomnia, and unsteady gait. Over time, bizarre sleep behaviors developed.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic psoriasis for the past 10 years; prior use of Chinese herbal decoctions containing calomel for psoriasis treatment.
medical_history.social_history: Occasional smoking and social alcohol consumption; no other substance use reported.
